title: Staff of Arcane Blessing

hing aura. Its previous owner cast it aside - forgotten because there was nobody to bless.

BG3 Staff of Arcane Blessing Information

Mystra's Blessing: Bless grants an additional 1d4 to Saving Throws and Weapon Attack Rolls, and an additional 2d4 to Spell Attack Rolls. 1d8 (1d6)+4Bludgeoning Bless Topple Quarterstaff Versatile

BG3 Staff of Arcane Blessing Location & Where to Find

Location: Arcane Tower - At the top of the tower a boss drops a ring or can be asked to place the ring on a nearby
